players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's death is shocking. Bob, your silence last round makes me suspicious – what are you hiding?"

You: "I believe it's important for us to work together in finding the truth about Charlie's death. I don't have any concrete information at the moment, but I'll do my best to gather any clues that might help us."

Bob: "I agree with Alice, we should all work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. I have no concrete information at the moment but I will keep a close eye on Diana and report any suspicious behavior."
Diana: "Bob, your sudden vigilance after being silent is suspicious. We should consider that. Alice, do you agree?"
